name: Night Running
description:
This is a simple endless runner made in around 24 hours, just for practice.

CONTROLS:

Space - Jump
A/Left Arrow - Move Left
D/Right Arrow - Move Right

This whole game is about avoiding the obstacles you're running towards by jumping above them, hit them and you're done.

Like the art? 

Background, music, character and most obstacles can be found here (that's almost everything!).

I don't plan to change many things but any feedback/comment is appreciated!
